content.value:
When people fight for binary “women” and “men” shopping experiences, I ask them:

1️⃣ Would you make a “nonbinary” category?
2️⃣ What would you put under it?
3️⃣ Now, imagine if you didn’t bother with gender at all. Could you remove a lot of clicks and barriers to entry?
content.html: When people fight for binary “women” and “men” shopping experiences, I ask them: 1️⃣ Would you make a “nonbinary” category? 2️⃣ What would you put under it? 3️⃣ Now, imagine if you didn’t bother with gender at all. Could you remove a lot of clicks and barriers to entry?
